title: The Indochina and Vietnam Wars - Collection 2
description:
The Indochina and Vietnam Wars - Collection 2:

Several titles about the Indochina/Vietnam wars were previously uploaded within various collections. Here, they are put together in one collection, and We have here 26 titles:

-  Bradley & Young (Eds.) - Making Sense of the Vietnam Wars; Local, National and Transnational Perspectives (2008)

-  Ellsberg - Secrets; a Memoir of Vietnam and the Pentagon Papers (1975)

-  Fall - Street without Joy; the French Debacle in Indochina (1964)

-  Fielding - Before the Killing Fields; Witness to Cambodia and the Vietnam War (2008)

-  Hallin - The Uncensored War; the Media and Vietnam (1986)

-  Hosch - The Korean War and the Vietnam War; People, Politics and Power (2010)

-  Lawrence - The Vietnam War; a Concise International History (2008)

-  Logevall - Embers of War; the Fall of an Empire and the Making of America's Vietnam (2012)

-  McMaster - Dereliction of Duty; Lyndon Johnson, Robert McNamara, the Joint Chiefs of Staff, and the Lies That Led to Vietnam (1997)

-  Nelson - The War Behind Me; Vietnam Veterans Confront the Truth about US War Crimes (2008)

-  O'Sullivan - Colin Powell, American Power and Intervention from Vietnam to Iraq (2009)

-  Pears - Remnants of Empire in Algeria and Vietnam; Women, Words, and War (2004)

-  Porter - Perils of Dominance; Imbalance of Power and the Road to War in Vietnam (2005)

-  Prouty - The CIA, Vietnam, and the Plot to Assassinate John F. Kennedy (2009)

-  Ruane - War and Revolution in Vietnam, 1930-75 (1998)

-  Rust - Before the Quagmire; American Intervention in Laos, 1954-1961 (2012)

-  Sheehan - A Bright Shining Lie; John Paul Vann and America in Vietnam (1989)

-  Smith - Britain and the Origin of Vietnam War (2007)

-  Smith - Churchill, America and Vietnam, 1941Ã¢â‚¬â€œ45 (2011)

-  Spencer - The Media and Peace; from Vietnam to the 'War on Terror' (2005)

-  Statler - Replacing France; the Origins of American Intervention in Vietnam (2007)

-  Tuchman - The March of Folly from Troy to Vietnam (1984)

-  Turse - Kill Anything That Moves; the Real American War in Vietnam (2013)

-  Wilcox - Scorched Earth; Legacies of Chemical Warfare in Vietnam (2011)

-  Windrow - The French Indochina War, 1946-54 (1998)

-  Zinoman - The Colonial Bastille; A History of Imprisonment in Vietnam, 1862Ã¢â‚¬â€œ1940 (2001)
